fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3.equipments.boiler

Class Boiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3.equipments.boiler.Boiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, BoilerControlImplementationI, BoilerReactiveControlImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI

    public class Boiler
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements BoilerControlImplementationI, BoilerReactiveControlImplementationI
    The class Boiler implements a boiler component for the household energy management example.

    Description

    In this version, the class is incomplete as it does not implement neither the connection between components nor the component life-cycle.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2020-09-22

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
